_a-0000ec50-281e-8000-9bb6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_initiateDocumentMaps
_a-0000ec50-281e-8000-9bb6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!folderDocumentMaps: rule!CMGT_EXT_GetDocumentsFromFolder(
    rootFolder: cons!CMGT_EXT_FLD_REFERENCE_DOCUMENTS,
    recursiveSearch: false()
  ),
  local!documentsRule: index(
    rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_ReturnDatsetDetailsByDatasetName(datasetUuids: ri!datasetUuids),
    "documentRule",
    null
  ),
  local!documents: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(local!documentsRule, fv!item())
  ),
  local!documentMaps: if(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(local!documentsRule),
    null,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!documents,
      expression: #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
        fv!item,
        "referenceDocument",
        displayvalue(
          fv!item.referenceName,
          local!folderDocumentMaps.name,
          local!folderDocumentMaps.document,
          todocument(null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  /*Reject items that do not have corresponding documents  */
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
    records: local!documentMaps,
    field: "referenceDocument",
    value: todocument(null),
    filterType: "REJECT"
  )
)

_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_ENUM_DATASET
_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The data rules for each type are mapped and retrieved with the dataset name where necessary.Here we are having the rule names without () and will be adding '()' in the rules where these rules are used
    datasetName --> The constant containing the name of the dataset
    caseRule-->The name of the rule containing the cases data for the dataset type
    studioFieldsRule -->The name of the rule containing the studio fields data for the dataset type
    referenceTaskRule --> The name of the rule containing the reference tasks data for the dataset type
    taskBlockRule --> The name of the rule containing the task block rule for the dataset type
    caseTypeWorkflowRule --> The name of the rule containing the case type workflow rule for the dataset type
    documentRule --> The name of the rule containing the document rule for the dataset type
    commentRule --> The name of the rule containing the comment rule for the dataset type
    taskUpdateRule -->The name of the rule containing the task status update rule for the dataset type
    deployments --> The respective dataset deployments needs to be passed in the below structure
        a!map(
            onInitialLoad: a!map(
                              packageZip --> The package to be deployed only on initial deployment ,
                              scripts--> The scriptsto be deployed only on initial deployment
                              icfFile--> The ICF file to be deployed only on initial deployment
                              ),
            onEachLoad: a!map(
                              packageZip --> The package to be deployed on each load except the initial load ,
                              scripts--> The scripts to be deployed on each load except the initial load 
                              icfFile--> The ICF file to be deployed on each load except the initial load 
                              ),
    )              
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
{
  a!map(
    datasetName: cons!CMGT_EXT_DATASET_RESIDENTIAL_PERMIT,
    datasetUuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[1],
    caseRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Case,
    studioFieldsRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_CaseStudioFields,
    referenceTaskRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_ReferenceTasks,
    taskBlockRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_TaskBlocks,
    caseTypeWorkflowRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_WorkflowTasks,
    documentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Documents,
    commentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Comments,
    taskUpdateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_Task_StatusUpdate,
    automationRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_AutomationRules,
    emailTemplateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_EmailTemplates
  ),
  a!map(
    datasetName: cons!CMGT_EXT_DATASET_FRAUDULENT_TRANSACTIONS,
    datasetUuid: cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_GENERATED_CASE_CATEGORY_UUIDS[2],
    caseRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Case,
    studioFieldsRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_CaseStudioFields,
    referenceTaskRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_ReferenceTasks,
    taskBlockRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_TaskBlocks,
    caseTypeWorkFlowRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_WorkflowTasks,
    documentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Documents,
    commentRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Comments,
    taskUpdateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Task_StatusUpdate,
    automationRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_AutomationRules,
    emailTemplateRule: rule!CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_EmailTemplates
  )
}

0002ec56-5a5c-8000-ff87-7f0000014e7a.name: CMGT_EXT_DemoData_Load_DocumentMap

_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_UTIL_ReturnDatsetDetailsByDatasetName
_a-0000ec34-7771-8000-9bb0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
    records: rule!CMGT_EXT_ENUM_DATASET(),
    field: "datasetUuid",
    value: ri!datasetUuids
  ),
  cast(typeof(a!map()), fv!item)
)

af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.name: CMGT_UTIL_Filter
af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    apply(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_CreateFieldValuePair(
        field: _,
        value: ri!value,
        allFields: a!flatten(ri!field)
      ),
      a!flatten(ri!field)
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000ec0f-47ad-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EXT_GetDocumentsFromFolder
